name: TP-Link TL-WDN3800 802.11a/b/g/n PCIe x1 Wi-Fi Adapter
Features: [Wireless Modes: Ad-Hoc / Infrastructure mode, Achieves a maximum theoretical throughput of up to 300Mbps, Seamlessly compatible with 802.11a/b/g/n products, Experience smoother video streaming and online gaming by choosing the clearer 5GHz band for wireless connections, Bundled utility provides quick & hassle-free installation, Dual Band support - 2.4GHz or 5GHz channels bring an optimized HD video streaming, file sharing and online experience, Two antennas increase wireless performance and stability.]
